divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on the swing on the front porch. Listening to internet radio on my phone, having a drink and smoking a cigarette. I look up to the left a bit and right above the tree line, about 300 - 500 ft away and I noticed a set of lights over the trees and I thought to myself, that plane is flying really low. It's going to crash. that's when I noticed directly up and right of the set of lights, 3 more lights. in a line . . . and i focused on them and all of a sudden a fourth light appeared . . . . and as the light on the left appeared the one on the right disappeared.. so i stand up and walk to the side of the porch. to get a better look. as i'm standing there looking at these two sets of lights I'm saying to myself out loud, "you have to be kidding me, this isn't happening. I am not seeing this" and I immediately think of my phone sitting on the railing at the end of the porch.. I glance over at my phone thinking, i need a picture of this. I looked back up in the sky and it was as if it knew I was going to take a picture of it and it all just disappeared.. I sat back down in the swing and started yelling for it to come back. Strange
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sparta
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 3 lights side by side, then two lights side by side a little below
